reqs:
This course, ARTH 226 001, has both a lecture and corresponding tutorial sections. Both are required. This course will be held on Mondays and Wednesday. The Friday is reserved for the occasion of class review sessions.
This tutorial section is taken in conjunction with ARTH 226 001. To register in a tutorial section you must first be registered in the lecture.
This tutorial section is taken in conjunction with ARTH 226 001. To register in a tutorial section you must first be registered in the lecture.
This section has been set up to allow you to register in it despite the apparent conflict with Friday's held time. If it will not allow you to register in the Friday tutorial section please contact the Department of Art History, Visual Art and Theory.
This tutorial section is taken in conjunction with ARTH 226 001. To register in a tutorial section you must first be registered in the lecture.
courseName: Art in an Era of Global Expansion
description: A selective survey of painting, sculpture, and architecture from the 16th century to the emergence of the modern era.
